definition: to rest/to stop doing sth for a period of time/to cease/(imperative) don't
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: The main reason of death was hemorrhagic shock.
sentences.chinese: 失血性休克是死亡的主要原因。

sentences.english: Objective To treat acute myocardial infarction with cardiogenic shock by emegency PCI.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討急性心肌梗死合併心源性休克的搶救方法。

sentences.english: I could have gone into Anaphylactic Shock.
sentences.chinese: 我可能會過敏性休克的。

sentences.english: Methods Two methods of blood sampling were applied in hemorrhagic shock model.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用兩種失血性休克動物模型的取血方法。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of oxygen therapy in the treatment of high altitude hemorrhagic shock in rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討氧療對高原失血性休克兔的治療作用。

sentences.english: Is cortisol necessary for severe sepsis or septic shock?
sentences.chinese: 嚴重膿毒症及感染性休克時是否需用皮質醇？

sentences.english: Several more rear shock mounting position for better adjustability .
sentences.chinese: 多個後方休克安裝位置更好的適應性。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the antishock effect of oxygenate solution and its possible mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討氧合液的抗休克作用和機制。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE:To explore the mechanism of Huiyang Fumai injection against shock.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討回陽復脈注射液抗休克的療效機理。

sentences.english: Respiratory failure and refractory shock have been the most common causes of death.
sentences.chinese: 呼吸衰竭和難治性休克屬於最常見死因。

sentences.english: Why is the LRS shock located on the left side?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼是該組休克，位於左側的？

sentences.english: Semiquantitation of HSPs was performed by immunoblotting.
sentences.chinese: 熱休克蛋白半定量是執行的免疫。

sentences.english: The main cause of death was hemorrhagic shock.
sentences.chinese: 失血性休克是死亡的主要原因。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Penehvclidine Hydrochloride would be one of the ideal vasoactive drugs in treatment for septic shock.
sentences.chinese: 結論長託寧是膿毒性休克患者較理想的血管活性藥。

sentences.english: Hypovolemic shock developed while we were performing a series of examinations.
sentences.chinese: 在進行一系列檢查期間發生低血容積性休克。

sentences.english: As a result, the figures appear depthless, as if in a protracted state of shock.
sentences.chinese: 因此，這些人物顯得空洞，彷佛長期處於休克的狀態。

definition: to lose consciousness/to be in a coma/stupor/coma/stunned/disoriented
